column4: ok i just got my laptop the way i want it to be; is there some way to save my current setup as some sort of install file so that way if my hard drive was to crash or some thing and i had to reinstall on a diffrent computer I could recover i could just reinstall from a live cd of  my current setup?
mostly all settings saved in /etc so what you need is to backup that directory
and your home if you want to
